newsitem.title: ITALY: Italy Jan PSBR around 3 trn lire - state auditor.
newsitem.headline: Italy Jan PSBR around 3 trn lire - state auditor.

text.p: Italy's public sector borrowing requirement in January should be "a good all around figure" of some three trillion lire, state auditor Andrea Monorchio was quoted as saying on Saturday.
Monorchio was quoted by ANSA news agency as saying the "figure should be around there (three trillion lire)", but added that he still did not have the full details of last month's PSBR.
"It's a good all around figure," Monorchio said.
Italy's public sector deficit for January 1996 was 12.35 trillion lire.

Monorchio said last week that the January PSBR appeared in line with expectations. Media reports had suggested that early 1997 data might be worse than expected, underlining the need for a hefty mini-budget. -- Rome newsroom +396 6782501
